https://tmrev.io/movie/653733-Be Water 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yUDtBBQEpmYptyk6wbYR54Sa2OD.jpg In 1971, after being rejected by Hollywood, Bruce Lee returned to his parents’ homeland of Hong Kong to complete four iconic films. Charting his struggles between two worlds, this portrait explores questions of identity and representation through the use of rare archival footage, interviews with loved ones and Bruce’s own writings. Be Water
